page.title: 09A WORKING DAY AT RISE FARM
page.content: 7.00-The Farmer gets up and has his breakfast. 8.00-discusses the day's work with his workers. 8.15-checks the farrowing sows. after that he prepares the tractors. 9.30-has coffee break, collects post, does phone calls. 10.30-treats any sick pigs and starts crop work. 12.00-stops for lunch 1.00-crop work, general farm duties. 3.00 has a drink, after he does the same duties until at 5.00 he sees stock men before they leave. 5.15- has a bath and tea. 6.00- goes swimming and watches T.V. 9.00- watches the news. 9.30-visits the pigs and checks that all the gates are shut. after that plans the next day. 11.00-goes to bed. That is the end of the Farmer's day.
